title: Ayurvedic Sleep Pillow (Lavender + Jatamansi)
excerpt: Small neck pillow filled with buckwheat hulls and calming herbs (lavender + jatamansi) to support relaxation and sleep onset.
content:
## What Is This Sleep Pillow?
A compact neck/eye pillow filled with buckwheat hulls and an inner sachet of dried lavender and jatamansi for gentle, long-lasting scent and support.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Lavender and jatamansi calm the nervous system and help balance Vata-related agitation. Buckwheat hulls provide comfortable, contouring support to reduce neck tension and improve sleep posture.

### Key Benefits
- Promotes relaxation and faster sleep onset.
- Contours to neck for gentle support.
- Refillable herb sachet for long-term use.

## Ingredients
- Buckwheat hull filling
- Dried lavender flowers
- Dried jatamansi (spikenard)
- Cotton removable cover with zipper

## Usage Instructions
- Place under the neck or across the eyes while resting; replace or refresh inner herb sachet every 3â€“6 months for scent vitality.

## Packaging
- Cotton cover with zipper and a small refill sachet included.

## Safety & Consultation
- Do not use on infants. Patch-test for fragrance sensitivity; discontinue if irritation or allergy occurs.

## Why Choose This Pillow?
A simple, natural sleep aid combining supportive ergonomics with calming Ayurvedic aromatics for improved nightly rituals.
